reviews.text: Just came here to say: ORDER THE CHOCOLATE ICE BOX CAKE!!! You won't regret it. It's one of those, "it was so good you still think about it"...

Tonight dinner was with Rusty Bucket via DoorDash! This tried and true Columbus staple didn't disappoint. Everything was delicious!!
